title: Myleene Klass is glowing as she takes newborn son Apollo to work... two months after giving birth
text:
She welcomed her first child with partner Simon Motson nearly two months ago.

And Myleene Klass, 41, was glowing as she headed to work as a presenter for Smooth Radio at Global Studios in London on Friday, and brought little Apollo along for the ride.

The mother-of-three looking effortlessly chic in a beige mac and oversized sunglasses, which glammed up the rest of her, much more casual, attire.

Hot mama! Myleene Klass, 41, was glowing as she headed to work as a presenter for Smooth Radio at Global Studios in London on Friday, and brought little Apollo along for the ride

Myleene strolled along in white plimsoll style trainers, and opted to wear mauve tracksuit bottoms and a plain black top.

Her long beige mac added an extra layer of warmth as she trotted along pushing her youngest child's buggy.

Myleene added a few delicate golden necklaces and large hoop earrings to finish off her weekend look.

The former Hear'Say star wore her brunette tresses loose and sported a minimal make-up look, allowing her natural beauty to shine.

Glam: The mother-of-three looking effortlessly chic in a beige mac and oversized sunglasses, which glammed up the rest of her, much more casual, attire

Keeping it casual: Myleene strolled along in white plimsoll style trainers, and opted to wear mauve tracksuit bottoms and a plain black top

Her stylish walk to work comes just two months after she welcomed third child Apollo, a baby boy, on August 1.

The singer has rarely been spotted without her son since his birth and Myleene has proved herself to be every inch the doting mother - regularly sharing snaps of the youngster on Instagram.

She gave a glimpse into her home life when she shared a video of the tot being 'mesmerised' by his big sister's impressive piano skills.

Dressed in a just a nappy, the newborn was seen sitting on his mother's lap as they watched his sibling play, with Myleene captioning the clip 'mesmerised'.

All wrapped up: Her long beige mac added an extra layer of warmth as she trotted along pushing her youngest child's buggy

Last month, Myleene detailed her baby boy's 'complicated' birth in a candid interview with Hello! Magazine.

She explained: 'My waters broke and I was in the birthing pool. We had a really easy first three hours, to the point that I thought we would all be home by 7pm. But I don't remember what happened next.

'I lost five hours of my life and it was a pretty complicated birth in the end.'

Myleene added that giving birth in her 40s had been 'an extremely different experience' to what she had been through previously.

The host is also mother to daughters Ava, 12, and Hero with ex-husband Graham, while Simon has two children from a previous relationship.
